name: Unique Software Development LLC
tagline: A Place where Apps and Systems Come to Life!
description:
The World Doesn’t Just Save Itself…
From our US headquarters in Dallas, TX to our offices and labs in Athens, Greece and Karachi, Pakistan - we look to innovatively make this world a better place with each and every product, system, idea and app we release.
We're strategists, technologists, designers, and developers who share a passion for collaboration and challenge each other to discover elegant solutions and deliver meaningful, substantial, and enduring interactive experiences through an understanding of core problems aligned with brand, strategy, and campaign goals.
READ MORE...
